programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Daryl Dixon's arrival to France sets off a violent chain of events that inadvertently puts a young boy at the heart of a growing religious movement in danger; Daryl agrees to help shepherd the boy to safety in exchange for help returning to America.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Daryl, Isabelle, Laurent and Sylvie face trouble on the road; Isabelle remembers the day the hungry ones appeared; Laurent struggles to fit in.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: The group arrives in Paris, where Isabelle confronts her past while growing closer to Daryl; Codron seeks help from the leader of a growing nationalist movement called Pouvoir, putting the Union of Hope and Laurent under dangerous scrutiny.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Daryl and Isabelle must negotiate with Quinn, the proprietor of the underground Demimonde club, the last vestige of art and expression in Paris.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Genet ensures to strengthen her base of power; Daryl has a job to do before he can go back to America.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Moulin Rouge
